feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest ic.dev news and events.

entry.title: Introducing ic.dev
entry.summary:
Posted by Farzad Senart and Lionel Suss

We're excited to introduce ic.dev, an open source project you can use to describe all your infrastructure resources on AWS using Python and high-level abstractions. We also ship with a free and public registry to allow authors and contributors to make their infrastructure resources available for the community. In this post, we'll go through some remarkable aspects of the project, and an overview of its possibilities.
